content:
I logged the following JIRA, proposing the lower the binding strength we have on HGVS components. I made this suggestion to get rid of a class of QA errors being generated since we have it as REQUIRED today. Since HGVS isn't a supported terminology, all examples that include HGVS throw QA errors.

Welcome thoughts/comments/feedback:

https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29941
Just FYI - This isn't needed after all. The examples that were failing for a different reason, and someone (me) didn't read the error closely enough. :frown: So I have withdrawn the JIRA.
